text: Yā pana bhikkhunī aññaṃ cetāpetvā aññaṃ cetāpeyya nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yā pana bhikkhunī aññaṃ cetāpetvā aññaṃ cetāpeyya nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 5. Should any bhikkhunī, having had one thing bought, (then send it back and) have another thing bought, it is to be forfeited and confessed.
